title: Basic Usage
content: The value attribute is used for bidirectional binding. The specified value is the default value and is displayed in the list on the right. The data attribute provides the data source. It is an object array. The default fields in the object are key, label, and disabled.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Data Source
content: You can request the service to obtain data and assign the data to data.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Display All Move Buttons
content: You can set the show-all-btn attribute to display all mobile buttons.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Customized List Title
content: You can use the titles attribute to customize the titles of the left and right lists.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Custom Button Copywriting
content: The button-texts attribute is used to customize the left and right button text.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Search box placeholder
content: Customize the search box placeholder through the filter-placeholder attribute.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Custom Search Method
content: Provides the filter-method hook function to customize the search method.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Default options
content: Use the left-default-checked and right-default-checked attributes to specify the default selected data in the left and right lists.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Customized Data Item Rendering
content: Use render-content to customize data items
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Selected status copywriting at the top of the list
content: After the format attribute is specified, the ratio of the selected data to all data is displayed on the top of the left and right lists when data is selected.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Searchable
content: The filterable attribute is used to enable the search function for the left and right lists.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Field alias of the data source
content: When a field in a data object is inconsistent with the default value, the props attribute can be used for mapping.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Right Sorting Policy
content:
Use the target-order attribute to set the sorting policy of the elements in the list on the right. The options are original, push, and unshift. The default value is original.

Sorting Policy

If the value is original, the sequence of the data source is the same as that of the data source. If the value is push, the newly added elements are ranked last. If the value is unshift, the newly added elements are ranked first
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Drag left and right
content:
Before using the drag-and-drop function for the

, install the sortablejs plug-in. The

uses the drop-config attribute to configure the sortablejs plug-in.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Shuttle Box Event
content:
There are three events: change, left-check-change, and right-check-change.

Event Description

change: Triggered when an element in the list on the right changes. left-check-change: Triggered when an element in the list on the left is selected or deselected. right-check-change: Triggered when an element in the list on the right is selected or deselected
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Clear the search box manually
content: Invoke the clearQuery() method to clear the search boxes in the left and right lists. The parameter is left or right.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Custom List Bottom
content: You can customize the bottom of the left and right lists through the left-footer and right-footer slots.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Panel Slot
content: You can use left-panel and right-panel to customize the contents of the left and right panels. Use button to customize the shuttle button
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Nested Table
content: When plugin in the render attribute is set to Table, the shuttle box is rendered as a table. For details, see the configuration of the grid component.
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.

title: Nested Tree
content: When plugin in the render attribute is set to Tree, the shuttle box is rendered as a tree. Configure tree-related configurations through the treeConfig attribute. (For details, see the configuration of the tree component.)
findIntroStr: Shuttle box, which provides bidirectional selection of table data.
